DOC.detailed_description: The Xenium+ new high flux dialyzer make Polynephron membrane design manufacture Nipro Company Japan . This dialyzer subject in-vitro testing , legally required biological safety test conduct CE-mark grant June 2010 . Xenium+ Polynephron membrane Xenium family dialyzer available commercially globally approximately three year . Clinical evaluation complete Polynephron membrane within last three year . The improvement Xenium+ line case make polypropylene . The aim dialyzer evaluation compare performance characteristic hemocompatibility Xenium+ ( Polynephron ) , Fresenius FX Gambro Polyflux dialyzer .
